verbose_text: Notably, incubation of Kif18A FL -mGFP-His 10 but not tail-less Kif18A (aa 1-845, Deltatail) with taxol stabilized MTs resulted in strong MT bundling (XREF_FIG H) suggesting that, similar to yeast Kip3p, the additional MT binding site enables Kif18A to crosslink MTs.
evidence: MT bundling ( XREF_FIG H) suggesting that, similar to yeast Kip3p              , the additional MT binding site enables Kif18A to crosslink MTs
